RelatedSentence: MANILA , Philippines - The camp of Janet Lim Napoles expressed a moral plea for senators to inhibit themselves from the Senate Blue Ribbon Committee proceedings .
MANILA , Philippines - The camp of Janet Lim Napoles expressed a moral plea for senators to inhibit themselves from the Senate Blue Ribbon Committee proceedings .

In an interview with ANC on Monday , Napoles ' lawyer , Bruce Rivera , said that his client is willing to appear for the second time in the Senate panel inquiry , but lawmakers tagged in the pork barrel scam may pose unhelpful questions .
